channel.title: Google Summer of Code on Chaitanya's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Google Summer of Code on Chaitanya's blog

item.title: LLVM.org Website Redesign GSoC Project Introduction
item.description: IntroductionIâ€™m Chaitanya Shahare, a passionate full-stack web developer and a pre-final-year Mechanical Engineering student at the National Institute of Technology Srinagar, India. This summer, I’m delighted to embark on an exciting journey with LLVM as Google Summer of Code 2024 contributor, where I’ll be contributing to the LLVM project by improving the look and feel of its central hub, the LLVM.org website. Mentors: Tanya Lattner and Vassil Vassilev Why I Chose LLVM.

item.title: I Got Accepted in Google Summer of Code (GSoC) 2024!!!
item.description: I am very delighted to announce that I have been accepted into Google Summer of Code 2024! It’s an incredible opportunity, and I’m beyond excited to be a part of this enriching experience. For those who may not be familiar, Google Summer of Code (GSoC) is a global program that connects students with open source software organizations to work on a summer programming project under the guidance of experienced mentors.
